data.text: Nde na fafe kelife Edon bɔxi ma,
«Munfe ra i xa dugi gbeelixi alɔ mixi naxan wɛni bogi bunduma?»
«N tan keren bara wali alɔ mixi naxan wɛni bunduma.
N bɔɲɛ nu wama gbe ɲɔxɔɛ nan xɔn.
N mu mixi to naxan n malima,
N bara sie boron n ma xɔnɛ kui,
N Alatala xa hinnɛ fe falama nɛ wo bɛ.
A a fala nɛ, «N laxi a ra n ma ɲama nan yi ki,
E xa tɔɔrɛ xa fe nu a tɔɔrɔma,
Kɔnɔ e naxa muruta a ma,
Ɲama bara a maɲɔxun fe singee ma,
Ala naxan Munsa mali a sɛnbɛ karalanke ra,
Alatala Xaxili nu malabui fima e ma,
I xa i ya ragoro keli koore ma,
Kɔnɔ hali Iburahima nun Isirayila nɛɛmu muxu ma,
Munfe ra i a niyama, muxu xa i xa kira rabɛɲin?
I xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi nu na muxu bɛlɛxɛ,
I gbe nan muxu ra kabi tɛmui xɔnkuye,
